events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because the size I ordered doesn't fit at all. Can you help me with the process?
This case has been identified as a refund request related to a sizing issue with a recently purchased jacket.
Your request has been assigned to our Refund Specialist Team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your refund. I'm here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or worn, so we can proceed accordingly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new and has not been worn; the tags are still attached.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label via email today. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your full refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions! I appreciate the help and will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this refund case now. If you have any other concerns, feel free to reach out. Thank you for shopping with us!
